name: PhenX05_15_30D cereal amt

concept.display: Cooked cereals (such as oatmeal, cream of wheat, grits)
All bran cereals (such as All Bran®, Fiber One®, 100% Bran®, or Bran Buds®)
Cereals with some bran or fiber (such as Cheerios®, Raisin Bran®, Shredded Wheat®, Total®, Wheaties®, 40% Bran flakes®, Granola, Grape Nuts®, Muselix®, etc.)
Cereals with little bran or fiber (such as Corn Flakes®, Honey Nut Cheerios®, Froot Loops®, Rice Krispies®, Kix®, Frosted Flakes®, Special K®, Cap'n Crunch®, Blueberry Morning®, Product 19®, etc.)
